```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(lubridate)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(ggthemes)
library(scales)
```

```{r}
df<-read.csv('resume_data.csv')
df$Date<-dmy(df$Date)
str(df)
df<-df %>% gather(field,ratio,Management:Supplier.Management)
ggplot(df, aes(Date, ratio)) +geom_area(aes( fill= field), position = 'stack')   + theme_economist() + scale_fill_economist()
  

```
```{r}
palette<-c("#075272","#ca3016","#ffba00","#23907b", "#897a8d","#70ddca")

p<-ggplot(df, aes(Date, ratio)) +theme_fivethirtyeight()+geom_area(aes( fill= field), position = 'stack') +scale_x_date(breaks = pretty_breaks(15))+scale_fill_manual(values = palette)+labs(colour="")+theme(axis.title = element_text(), axis.title.x=element_blank(), axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1),legend.text=element_text(size=10),plot.caption=element_text(size=8),legend.title=element_blank(),legend.position="bottom", legend.direction="horizontal")+ggtitle("from MRP to MVP")+labs(caption = "©Clément Lefèvre 2017 (Source : linkedin.com)")+ylab("%")
ggsave('resume.png',p,width = 12, height = 8,)
```
